WorkItem.Description:
I am looking for very simple example for using  WebCam from WPF.  (EasyWebCam library example does not work - just crush on my PC)
For me very important use only WPF-library (NO third party library)
Thanks.

Comments.Message:
Hello CodeTwo,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I'd like to confirm with you my understanding of the sample request:

The topic  which you posted is about directshow. It should use c++ language to compose it, so it is hard to compose only by csharp language.I can tell you a good news,sourceforge has directshow.net package used to do this one. And you can use WPF MediaKit such as http://wpfmediakit.codeplex.com/. We recommend the lastest one because of its my brother project. I will dig into it with researching. If it is escalated by other one, I will post it. Thanks for your supporting. 



Thanks
All-In-One Code Framework
http://1code.codeplex.com
